response:
A young woman with multifocal central nervous system involvement affecting optic nerve and cerebellum, normal peripheral examination and no major metabolic disturbance is most consistent with immune-mediated CNS demyelination, particularly multiple sclerosis; other autoimmune, infectious and hereditary causes of optic neuropathy with cerebellar ataxia must be excluded.

differential_diagnosis = ["Multiple sclerosis", "Neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder", "Myelin oligodendrocyte glycoprotein antibody-associated disease", "Neurosarcoidosis with optic neuritis and cerebellar involvement", "Paraneoplastic autoimmune cerebellar degeneration with optic neuropathy", "Infectious or post-infectious central nervous system demyelination (for example viral, Lyme disease, syphilis)", "Hereditary spinocerebellar ataxia with optic atrophy"]
